Comments_List:
I learned how to give and receive feedback from my peers. I learned how to edit and revise a research paper. 
Most of all, I learned from my peers' projects and accomplishments. I was exposed to a job-talk for a post-doc position, which allowed me to see what is required to get hired at a university. 

I learned about public humanities applications for our research, too.
Team collaboration. Feedback giving to colleagues.
Strengths: This class is a community and a family. We all learn and support each other.
Yes, anybody with interests in Latinx Studies or even anybody looking for a supportive group of peers to share and receive feedback is extremely helpful.
Yes. It is a great space. The professors are truly talented careful mentors.
